casebody.data:
Robert B. MARTIN, Petitioner, v. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE, Respondent. No. 05-3327. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. July 11, 2006.

Before MAYER, LOURIE, and PROST, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM:

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
